00012 //:
00013 // An abstract functor that takes in an image, and returns features of
00014 // that image.
00015 class bundler_tracks_detect
00016 {
00017  public:
00018   //: Performs the feature matching
00019   virtual bundler_inters_image_sptr operator() (
00020       const vil_image_resource_sptr &image,
00021       const double exif_focal_len) = 0;
00022 };

00025 //:
00026 // An abstract functor that outputs a set of pairs of images that should
00027 // be matched.
00028 class bundler_tracks_propose_matches
00029 {
00030  public:
00031   //: Performs the match list creation
00032   virtual void operator() (
00033       const vcl_vector<bundler_inters_image_sptr> &features,
00034       vcl_vector<bundler_inters_image_pair> &matches) = 0;
00035 };

00038 //:
00039 // An abstract functor that takes in a pair of images to be matched,
00040 // finds all corresponding features between the two images
00041 class bundler_tracks_match
00042 {
00043  public:
00044   //: Performs the feature matching
00045   virtual void operator() (
00046       const bundler_inters_image_pair &to_match,
00047       bundler_inters_match_set &matches) = 0;
00048 }; 
00049 
00050 
00051 //:
00052 // An abstract functor that takes in corresponding features between 
00053 // two images, and refines them according to some thresholds.
00054 class bundler_tracks_refine
00055 {
00056  public:
00057   //: Performs the feature matching
00058   virtual void operator() (bundler_inters_match_set &matches) = 0;
00059 }; 
00060 
00061 
00062 //:
00063 // An abstract functor that takes in all matched features between pairs 
00064 // of images, and chains them together into tracks
00065 class bundler_tracks_chain_matches
00066 {
00067  public:
00068   //: Performs the track chaining
00069   virtual void operator() (
00070       vcl_vector<bundler_inters_match_set> &match_sets,
00071       vcl_vector<bundler_inters_image_sptr> &images,
00072       vcl_vector<bundler_inters_track_sptr> &tracks) = 0;
00073 };
